channel.title: How do you spawn npc's (monsters) i need help plz!
channel.description: so i got mopar and i figured out the items but how do i spawn monster plz help me

item.title: How do you spawn npc's (monsters) i need help plz!
item.dc:creator: @Porsche_911_Freak Porsche 911 Freak
item.description:
@Porsche_911_Freak wrote:

Also, if itâ€™s an attackable npc, add the level and hp you want it to be in the NPC.cfg file after you add it to the autospawn, otherwise the server will crash when you attack it (it does for me, at least)

Read full topic

item.title: How do you spawn npc's (monsters) i need help plz!
item.dc:creator: @spid3rm4n spid3rm4n
item.description:
@spid3rm4n wrote:

You can do it ingame with this command:

::npc ####

Or you can add them in autospawn.cfg
